response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to your business. I am offering this extraordinary opportunity to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value of $1,500,000, while still ensuring a fair profit for us. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
